about_the_game:
Embark on an immersive angling adventure with Fishing on the Fly—an indie game that takes fly fishing to the next level. Crafted with passion and precision by an ex-guide and solo developer Mac Clark, this game stands out as one of the few fishing simulations developed in the U.S.A. Fishing on the Fly offers gameplay experience enriched by genuine expertise and love for the sport.

Dive into explosive gameplay that captures the essence of real-world fly fishing. Navigate through beautifully rendered models of America’s most iconic blue-ribbon rivers. Test your skills by catching authentic trophy fish, each encounter designed to mirror the unpredictable nature of real-life fishing.

Fishing on the Fly presents a series of true-to-life fishing challenges that escalate in complexity, ensuring that every cast feels fresh and every catch is rewarding. The game’s original mechanics evolve as you progress, providing an enduring and satisfying challenge for anglers of all levels.

Powered by Unreal Engine 3, the game delivers throw back retro vibes that make every moment on the water feel like a serene escape. Whether you’re a seasoned fly fisher or new to the sport, Fishing on the Fly offers an unparalleled digital fishing experience that’s as close as you can get to the real thing without getting your feet wet.

Features


  • Discover: Unravel 14 chapters of fly fishing lore, unlocking mysteries and premium gear as you advance.
  • Customize: Elevate your game with a wealth of equipment, rivers, and modes—all tailored to your growing skills.
  • Adapt: Engage with real-world hatches that shift with the seasons, challenging even the most seasoned anglers.
  • Experience: Witness stunning animations and acrobatic fish, creating a myriad of electrifying gameplay moments.
  • Strategize: Employ authentic tactics to outsmart your aquatic adversaries, just as in real life.
  • Explore: Navigate meticulously crafted replicas of the West’s most renowned rivers, based on precise USGS data.
  • Earn: Collect Fish Bucks for your achievements and indulge in an extensive selection of in-game equipment and flies.
  • Show Off: Exhibit your hard-won trophies and gear in your personal man cave, becoming the envy of friends.
  • Encounter: Immerse yourself in an ecosystem teeming with wildlife—from majestic bears to diverse fish species.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: •NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 3.6 GHz/AMD FX-9590 4.7 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: •Intel Core i7 4790 3.6 GHz/AMD FX-9590 4.7 GHz or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
